contentList.content: Arcane Scroll
A mysterious scroll containing the knowledge of how to cast various skills and spells empowered by the Arcane element.

A mysterious scroll containing the knowledge of how to cast various skills and spells empowered by the Blood element.

A mysterious scroll containing the knowledge of how to cast an extremely powerful spell empowered by the Arcane element.
Ultimate Blood Scroll

Elemental Essence
The core essence of the elements.
Without an essence, you cannot weild the elements.
Elements Cheat Scroll
A mysterious scroll containing the knowledge of how to cast all of the basic spells empowered by the elements.
Ultimate Cheat Scroll
A mysterious scroll containing the knowledge of how to cast all of the ultimate spells empowered by the elements.
Weave Rejection
Your body is being rejected by the Weave.
Suppressing Weave
Inflict the target with an ailment that suppresses their use of the weave, and slightly tires their bodies.
Suppressing Weave Stage 2
The ailment has worsened, now also leaving the target vulnerable to force attacks.
Weave Suppressed

The final stage of the ailment, which can be fatal. It completely cuts off the target from magic, leaving them vulnerable to all manner of magic attacks. With the weave cut off, their bodies become lethargic.
Arcane Core
The core essence of the arcane skills and spells.
Arcane Affliction
Cut your targets ties to the Weave, leaving then unable to cast spells.
Arcane Blast
Blast a target area with the power of the Weave.
Arcane Bolt
Cast a bolt at your target with the power of the Weave.
Arcane Leap
Leap towards your target with the power of the Weave
Arcane Rush
Rush your target with the power of the Weave.
Arcane Shift
Teleport to your target with the power of the Weave
Arcane Stealth
Use the power of the Weave to hide and turn invisible.
Arcane Stealth Dismiss
Use the power of the Weave to come out of hiding and cancel your invisibility.
Sanguine Core
The core essence of the blood skills and spells.
Sanguine Bolt
Cast a bolt at your target with the power of Blood.
Sanguine Blast
Blast a target area with the power of Blood.
Sanguine Rush
Rush your target with the power of Blood.
Sanguine Leap
Leap towards your target with the power of Blood.
Sanguine Shift
Teleort to your target with the power of Blood.
Sanguine Stealth
Use the power of Blood to hide and turn invisible.
Sanguine Stealth Dismiss
Use the power of Blood to come out of hiding and cancel your invisibility
Frigid Rush
Rush your target with the power of Cold.
Darkness Rush
Rush your target with the power of the Night.

Rush your target with the power of Stone.

Rush your target with the power of Fire.

Rush your target with the power of Force.

Rush your target with the power of Lightning.

Rush your target with the power of Nature.
Grave Rush
Rush your target with the power of Undeath.
Cerebral Rush
Rush your target with the power of Psionics.
Brilliant Rush
Rush your target with the power of Light.
Shade Rush
Rush your target with the power of the Shadows.
Sonic Rush
Rush your target with the power of Sound.
Temporal Rush
Rush your target with the power of Time.
Abyssal Rush
Rush your target with the power of the Void.
Tidal Rush
Rush your target with the power of Water.
Zephyr Rush
Rush your target with the power of Wind.
